trans-unit.source: Defines size-related attributes of a cached bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: Définit les attributs liés à la taille d’une image bitmap mise en cache.

trans-unit.source: A bitmap is scaled based on values that are defined by this class.
trans-unit.target: Une image bitmap est mise à l’échelle en fonction des valeurs définies par cette classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> with empty sizing properties.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> avec des propriétés de dimensionnement vides.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Instance de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Retourné <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> aura son <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> propriété la valeur <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, ses <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> la valeur `true`, ses <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> nulle et son <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> égale à zéro.

trans-unit.source: When passed to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, the input is the same as the output.
trans-unit.target: Lorsqu’il est passé à un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, l’entrée est identique à la sortie.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Hauteur en pixels de l’image bitmap obtenue.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight" />.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une instance de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> qui conserve les proportions de l’image bitmap source et spécifie un <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight" /> initial.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Instance de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Retourné <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> aura son <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> propriété la valeur <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, ses <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> la valeur `true`, ses <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> la valeur de `pixelHeight`et son <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> égale à zéro.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="pixelHeight" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Se produit lorsque <paramref name="pixelHeight" /> est inférieur à zéro.

trans-unit.source: The initial rotation value to apply.
trans-unit.target: Valeur initiale de rotation à appliquer.

trans-unit.source: Only 90 degree increments are supported.
trans-unit.target: Seuls les incréments de 90 degrés sont pris en charge.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation" /> to apply.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une instance de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> qui conserve les proportions de la bitmap source et spécifie un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation" /> initial à appliquer.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Nouvelle instance de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap maintains its original aspect ratio and sizing.
trans-unit.target: L’image bitmap obtenue conserve ses proportions d’origine et le dimensionnement.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to the value of `rotation`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to 0, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to 0.
trans-unit.target: Retourné <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> aura son <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> affectée à la valeur de propriété `rotation`, ses <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> la valeur `true`, ses <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> définie sur 0 et son <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> définie sur 0.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Largeur en pixels de l’image bitmap obtenue.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth" />.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une instance de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> qui conserve les proportions de l’image bitmap source et spécifie un <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth" /> initial.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Instance de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: Retourné <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> aura son <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> propriété la valeur <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, ses <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> la valeur `true`, ses <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> nulle et son <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> la valeur de `pixelWidth`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="pixelWidth" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Se produit lorsque <paramref name="pixelWidth" /> est inférieur à zéro.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Largeur en pixels de l’image bitmap obtenue.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Hauteur en pixels de l’image bitmap obtenue.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> that does not preserve the original bitmap aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une instance de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> qui ne conserve pas les proportions de l’image bitmap d’origine.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Nouvelle instance de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap has an effective size of `pixelHeight` × `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: La bitmap résultante a une taille effective de `pixelHeight` × `pixelWidth`.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `false`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: Retourné <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> aura son <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> propriété la valeur <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, ses <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> la valeur `false`, ses <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> la valeur de `pixelHeight`et son <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> la valeur de `pixelWidth`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="pixelHeight" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Se produit lorsque <paramref name="pixelHeight" /> est inférieur à zéro.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: Hauteur, en pixels, de l’image bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The height of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Hauteur de la bitmap.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> must be greater than zero to be valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> doit être supérieure à zéro pour être valide.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: La largeur en pixels de l’image bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The width of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Largeur de l'image bitmap.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> must be greater than zero to be valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> doit être supérieure à zéro pour être valide.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether the aspect ratio of the original bitmap image is preserved.
trans-unit.target: Obtient une valeur qui détermine si les proportions de l’image bitmap d’origine sont conservées.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the original aspect ratio is maintained; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si les proportions d'origine sont maintenues ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the original aspect ratio is preserved, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> represent the maximum size values for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Si les proportions d’origine sont conservées, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> et <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> représentent les valeurs de la taille maximale de l’image bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap is only guaranteed to have either its width or its height match the specified values.
trans-unit.target: L’image bitmap obtenue est garantie uniquement pour que sa largeur ou sa hauteur correspondent aux valeurs spécifiées.

trans-unit.source: If the aspect ratio is not preserved, the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> are both used, and the bitmap is stretched to use those values.
trans-unit.target: Si les proportions ne sont pas conservées, le texte spécifié <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> et <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> sont tous deux utilisés, et l’image bitmap est étirée pour utiliser ces valeurs.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the rotation angle that is applied to a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Obtient une valeur qui représente l’angle de rotation appliqué à une image bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The rotation angle that is applied to the image.
trans-unit.target: Angle de rotation appliqué à l’image.

trans-unit.source: Only increments of 90 degrees are supported.
trans-unit.target: Seuls les incréments de 90 degrés sont pris en charge.
